structure.unit: ARTICLE X. PROPERTY TAX EXEMPTIONS IN ENTERPRISE ZONES

text.section:
Sec. 29-89. Expiration date.
The authority of the Board of County Commissioners to grant tax exemptions pursuant to this article, shall expire on June 30, 2015 and no business shall be allowed to begin receiving such exemption after that date; however, the expiration of this section shall not affect the operation of any exemption for which a business has qualified under this section prior to June 30, 2015.
